channel.title: Comments on: Tracking a Bike Ride & PIC16F88 GPS Logger DR1r7
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.description: Hi, how I can send PM?

item.title: By: Murali
item.dc:creator: Murali
item.description:
$GPRMC,185532,A,04025.7366,N,08653.9941,W,556.000,18
Having the above single output from GPS Receiver, Is there a easy way to display the location on google earth (or any other free application).
For example, in the above GPRMC string latitude = 04025.7366,N longitude = 08653.9941,W
Is there a way to give this two values (latitude & longitude) and get the location on google earth.
item.content:encoded:
$GPRMC,185532,A,04025.7366,N,08653.9941,W,556.000,18

Having the above single output from GPS Receiver, Is there a easy way to display the location on google earth (or any other free application).

For example, in the above GPRMC string
latitude = 04025.7366,N
longitude = 08653.9941,W

Is there a way to give this two values (latitude & longitude) and get the location on google earth.

item.title: By: Maliganis Nikolaos
item.dc:creator: Maliganis Nikolaos
item.description: Hi, My name is Maliganis Nikolaos and Iam electroic engineering in Medical School of Thessaloniki (Macedonia Greece). Your file "16f88-24lc1025-gps-compress-dr1r7.c (HEX)" have a problem. Could you upload correctly or send me in above email address? Thanks at all,
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
My name is Maliganis Nikolaos and Iam electroic engineering in Medical School of Thessaloniki (Macedonia Greece).
Your file “16f88-24lc1025-gps-compress-dr1r7.c (HEX)” have a problem.
Could you upload correctly or send me in above email address?
Thanks at all,
